name: Super Dungeon Tactics (itch)
description:
Super Dungeon game, it calls for you to venture through the dungeon and test your strength as you attempt to survive this turn based strategy RPG. Collecting as much as gold between the start of your adventure and your grave. Traverse the dungeon alone or with your trusted companions for an up to 4 person multiplayer experience. Choose between 4 champions - Warrior, Mage, Hunter, Healer. Discover chest 
that contains- Poisons,Weapons and Armor to keep you in the fight for longer. Find PORTALS to take you to a new dungeon with more GOLD to plunder. Earn gold through battle and looting.Complete with others to earn GOLD. What are you waiting for , riches awaits you in Super Dungeon .
